## QualifierTypes.ITerritoryQualifierTypeCreateParams.acceptLowercase property

Flag indicating whether the qualifier type should accept lowercase territory codes. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
acceptLowercase?: boolean;
```
